name: FolderSettings_Get
description: Gets the settings of a folder or meter

$ul: **Description**: The Description of the folder or meter
**Enable**: Flag if the meter is enabled (folder not supported yet)
**Name**: The Name of the folder or meter
**ParentFolderId**: The parent folder ID of this item
**UseableForVirtualBillingMeters**: Flag if the meter is usable for virtual billing meters (e.g. washroom)
**ValueCorrection**: The value correction on this meter
**ValueCorrectionParentFolder**: The value correction on all parent folders. but not on the meter itself
**VisualizationName**: The name of the visualization of the folder
